Function reference

All functions

BSRDataModel-class
BulkSignalR Data Model Object
BSRInference-class
BulkSignalR Inference Object
BSRSignature-class
BulkSignalR ligand-receptor signature Object
BulkSignalR
BulkSignalR: A package to infer ligand-receptor interactions from bulk transcriptomics or proteomics
LRinter(<BSRInference>)
LRinter accessor
`LRinter<-`(<BSRInference>)
LRinter setter (internal use only)

bodyMap.mouse
Mouse transcriptomes across tissues

Chord Diagram of LR interactions with correlations
convertToHuman()
Transpose to Human Gene Names
.buildPermutatedCountMatrix()
Internal function to generate a randomized expression matrix
.buildPermutationIndices()
Internal function to generate expression matrix permutation indices
.cdfAlphaStable()
Internal function to compute a censored alpha-) stable CDF
.cdfGaussian()
Internal function to compute a censored Gaussian CDF
.cdfMixedGaussian()
Internal function to compute a censored mixed-Gaussian CDF
.checkReceptorSignaling()
Internal function to check receptor signaling downstream
.customheatmap()
Heatmap function for gene expression of signature
.cutExtremeValues()
Internal function to cut extreme values from a matrix
.downstreamSignaling()
Internal function to check receptor signaling downstream
.edgesLRIntracell()
Internal function to generate a ligand-receptor-downstream signaling network
.geneNameConversion()
Convert gene symbol to another organism
.getAlphaStableParam()
Internal function to fit a censored (alpha-) stable distribution
.getCorrelatedLR()
Get correlated ligand-receptor pairs.
.getEmpiricalNull()
Sampling of correlations downstream the receptors null distribution
.getEmpiricalNullCorrLR()
Sampling of ligand-receptor correlation null distribution
.getGaussianParam()
Internal function to fit a censored Gaussian distribution
.getMixedGaussianParam()
Internal function to fit a censored mixed-Gaussian distribution
.pValuesLR()
Internal function to assign P-values to LR interactions
.shufflePermutationIndices()
Internal function to shuffle permutation indices
